com.miviclin.droidengine2d

Class Engine.EngineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.Engine.EngineBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Engine

    public static final class Engine.EngineBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    EngineBuilder is used to build the Engine.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

      • setRenderer

        public Engine.EngineBuilder setRenderer(EngineRenderer renderer)
        Sets the EngineRenderer.
        The default renderer is DefaultRenderer
        Parameters:
        renderer - EngineRenderer
        Returns:
        this EngineBuilder

      • setMaxFPS

        public Engine.EngineBuilder setMaxFPS(int maxFPS)
        Set the frame rate cap (maximum number of FPS the game will run at). The default value is 30.
        The frame rate cap can not be greater than the display refresh rate. If the specified value is greater than the display refresh rate, the frame rate cap will be set to the display refresh rate.
        Parameters:
        maxFPS - Frame rate cap
        Returns:
        this EngineBuilder

      • setMaxSkippedFrames

        public Engine.EngineBuilder setMaxSkippedFrames(int maxSkippedFrames)
        Sets the maximum number of frames the game will be updated before rendering in case performance is bad in the specified device.
        Parameters:
        maxSkippedFrames - Maximum number of skipped frames in case performance is bad
        Returns:
        this EngineBuilder

      • build

        public Engine build()
        Builds an Engine using this EngineBuilder
        Returns:
        Engine
